name: Mr.M
description:
Mr.M is no mere possum, but a possum with a mighty dream. In this short, narrative game you are going to help Mr.M to find three magic flowers.

This game is developed with Unity/Fungus. All the graphics are drawn by me, in reference to pictures found on Pinterest. Background music and sound effects are downloaded from free copyright website and Freesound.org.

Use left mouse click to continue dialog, click and drag objects.
